name: Dungeon Master (itch) (BotEgorchik)
description:
Dark forces enveloped the world. People are no longer able to fight monsters and evil spirits. Everyone is waiting for a savior who will be able to cleanse the world of filth, save the human race and defeat all three Dungeon Masters.

Controls: 

w - up

s - down

a - left

d - right

h - treatment potion

g - mana potion

Mouse - review

LMB - Sword attack

RMB- Magic attack

The game is under development, so some features in the game may be added or finished in the future. In the next update, I want to add more opponents and improve the level design. Have a nice game!
